gov.lbl.glamm.client.presenter
Class ReactionPresenter

java.lang.Object
  gov.lbl.glamm.client.presenter.ReactionPresenter

public class ReactionPresenter
extends java.lang.Object

Presenter for displaying reaction data for a map element. These data typically include: the definition, the Enzyme Commission (EC) numbers, and a table summarizing the genes and measurements for those genes, if applicable.

Author:
jtbates
